identity.name: Government Form Helper
identity.vibe: Trustworthy, Calm, Proactive, Official yet Approachable
identity.metaphor: A helpful expert sitting right next to you

usage.form_fields: IBM Plex Sans, font-normal, tracking-normal (To mimic official documents)

areas.form_container: col-span-12 lg:col-span-7 xl:col-span-8 bg-slate-50 p-8 overflow-y-auto
areas.ai_panel: fixed right-0 top-0 h-full w-[320px] md:w-[400px] bg-white shadow-2xl z-50 border-l border-slate-200 transform transition-transform duration-300 ease-out

form_input.classes: w-full rounded-sm border-slate-300 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm placeholder:text-slate-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500/20 focus:border-blue-500 transition-all font-ibm-plex
form_input.label_classes: text-xs font-bold text-slate-600 uppercase tracking-wide mb-1.5 block

ai_card.base_classes: rounded-xl border border-slate-100 bg-white p-5 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-[#2c3e50] text-white hover:bg-[#34495e] shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all rounded-full px-6 py-2.5 font-medium text-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-[#2c3e50] border border-[#2c3e50] hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-full px-6 py-2.5 font-medium text-sm

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Split World' concept: The Form (Left) should feel slightly bureaucratic (IBM Plex Sans, sharper corners) while the AI Panel (Right) feels modern and soft (Manrope, rounded corners, shadows).
Use 'lucide-react' for all icons. Do not use external image URLs for icons.
Ensure the AI Panel is fixed and overlays content on mobile, but sits side-by-side on desktop.
The 'Shimmer' effect is critical for the 'Thinking' state of the AI. Do not just use a spinner.
Use the 'data-testid' attribute for all interactive elements.
For the 'Clarification Question' card, make the options (Yes/No/Maybe) prominent, pill-shaped buttons.
The 'Passport Blue' (#2c3e50) is the brand anchor. Use it for the header of the AI panel and primary buttons.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. No gradients on the form background.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Do not center align the app container.
